channel.title: Posts on Sun, Rum & Data
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sun, Rum & Data

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content.

item.title: testing the markup
item.description: Barbados is hot! It’s a tropical paradise in the Caribbean it’s always been hot, but these days, thanks to global warming, it is hotter than ever before.
